summary: A collection of utilities that support int8 quantization and accelerated inference of Stable Diffusion models. It includes a percentile‑based calibration tool for gathering activation statistics, a wrapper for building and executing TensorRT engines, and helper functions for preparing inputs, loading prompts, and configuring the Ammo quantization framework.
business_intent: To enable fast, low‑precision deployment of Stable Diffusion, reducing compute cost and latency while maintaining visual quality, thereby facilitating scalable AI image generation services.
